title: single_work_light_5w_night_operation
summary: Single light used to support nighttime work under power constraints.
description: This data unit documents a single active light source used during nighttime work. The light is stated as 5W and serves as the primary lighting for continued system operations under limited power conditions.

linked_references.note: Daytime sunlight conditions earlier on the same day.
Inverter restart waiting period and power system operation context.

external_reference.note: Image shows a single bright lamp providing illumination in a dark environment.
